idea:
AYS Global Support is a fast-paced Mumbai-based company founded in 2020. We provide Social Media Services and Communication Centre Services to a diverse range of organisations across the globe. AYS Global Support commits to provide a bespoke service and exceed our clients' expectations.


We also act as a Service provider to the physicians in the USA for improving the doctor patient relationship and to deliver a better health care to the patients 

Qualities of our agents:Good communicators ,Language proficiency 

Good listening, interpreting and answering skills 

Work with full efficiency with the advantage of working from home.

Moreover, Helping them to make a smooth and effective communication with their clients using emails , whatsapp and other social media platforms.
name: AYS GLOBAL SUPPORT LLP

idea:
We would like to introduce Green Elephant Games Private Limited as publishers and distributors for many renowned and best-selling international board games.

We provide best board games to our customers .Our long term focus is to bring the best thematic games in different Indian vernacular languages. Engaging in play assists in practicing essential cognitive skills, such as decision making, higher level strategic thinking, and problem solving. We distribute some of the leading tabletop games in the world for the Indian market and export games from India to the US.
name: GREEN ELEPHANT GAMES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are creating a better world for children and parents by transforming the current unhealthy piercing practices that leads to health issues.

As a result, we are creating work opportunities for Goldsmiths and improving their way of life.


Problems that exists are;

1. Parents are in turmoil for their baby's ear piercing due to unhygienic options available

2. The providers viz; Jewellers - Unhygienic tools, toxic piercing needle & processes are adding to infections, 

Doctors & Tattoo studios - Use of surgical steel studs that have Toxic metal, Nickel in the piercing needle and the Gunshot method that causes harm to children (research papers available)

3. Travel inconvenience for infants and toddlers

4. Transactional approach by current providers is resulting to zero guidance on pre & post piercing care required for the parent
name: MYSUNAR JEWELS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Our deep understanding of current security vulnerabilities, penetration methodologies, and best practises, as one of the company's main DMT Services assessment leverage, enables clients to protect their assets, employees/people, information, and system against any conceivable or ever-present attack.

Our company's focus on efficiency, along with an innovative and customer-focused approach to the organisation of commercial security administrations, sets it apart from other organisations in the region. Finally, we provide true emotions of tranquilly to our consumers, helping them to fulfill their business goals.

We are a forward-thinking organisation that responds to domestic and commercial security demands with the best security personnel available. We are well-known for our well-prepared security team, which enables you to protect your business and personal belongings. We also provide you the option of finding any asset set at your location with the highest level of inventiveness, while also improving correspondence and security. We have security officer agreements for corporations, manufacturers, and bigger infrastructure, as well as home insurance, individual security, VIP insurance, event-based security, film sets, and more in some of the locations.
name: DMISHAL TURNKEY SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED
